text:
[Verse]
Stars are out just you and me
Lights above like we’re free
Feel the rhythm in the night
Everything will be alright

[Verse 2]
Shadows play on the ground
No one else around
We can leave the world behind
In the dance we’ll find

[Chorus]
Dancing dancing in the moonlight
Shining bright all through the night
Moving grooving to the beat
In the moonlight we're complete

[Bridge]
Hearts align in the sky
Time just passes by
Lost in our own space
With you it's the perfect place

[Verse 3]
Whispers in the cool breeze
Moments like these
Feel the beat under our feet
Every step so sweet

[Chorus]
Dancing dancing in the moonlight
Shining bright all through the night
Moving grooving to the beat
In the moonlight we're complete
title: Dancing in the Moonlight
